page.title: 14Local Childrens' Games
page.content: Local childrens' outdoor games fall into 2 categories, those played with a ball and those without. Of the former football, cricket, pig in the middle and rugby are favourite. Those games requiring no apparatus include hopscotch, farmer's in his den, London Bridge is falling down, What time is it Mister Wolf, red rover and hide and seek. Indoor games again fall into two categories, traditional Ludo, jigsaws, Monopoly, Scrabble and cards and the more recent electronic games including the micro-computer.
